explanation.rules:
We can see that the names of the children born on the same day of the week have similar first sounds:

Monday: kauɳ myaʔ, khiɳ le nwɛ, khaiɳ miɳ thuɳ, keþi thuɳ
Tuesday: zeiya cɔ, su myaʔ so, susu wiɳ, shaɳ thuɳ, shu maɳ cɔ
Wednesday: wiɳ i muɳ, lwiɳ koko, wiɳ cɔ auɳ, yadana u, yiɳyiɳ myiɳ
Thursday: paɳ we, pyesouɳ auɳ, mimi khaiɳ, phouɳ naiɳ thuɳ, myo khiɳ wiɳ
Saturday: thouɳ uɳ, ne liɳ, tiɳ mauɳ laʔ, thɛʔ auɳ, tiɳ za mɔ

Tuesday: zeiya cɔ, su myaʔ so, susu wiɳ, shaɳ thuɳ, shu maɳ cɔ
Wednesday: wiɳ i muɳ, lwiɳ koko, wiɳ cɔ auɳ, yadana u, yiɳyiɳ myiɳ
Thursday: paɳ we, pyesouɳ auɳ, mimi khaiɳ, phouɳ naiɳ thuɳ, myo khiɳ wiɳ
Saturday: thouɳ uɳ, ne liɳ, tiɳ mauɳ laʔ, thɛʔ auɳ, tiɳ za mɔ
